website_summaries.verdict: This all-natural skin balm works wonders for a wide range of skin problems and wounds, while nourishing the animal’s skin, reducing pain, repairing skin cells, and promoting hair growth in the affected area.
pros: Includes organic aloe gel, olive oil, soybean oil, and hemp seed oil
Aids in the healing of hot spots, mange, itchy skin, allergies, wounds, burns, cuts, sores, and other skin conditions
cons: This balm is a fairly expensive skin and wound restoring treatment, but it includes high levels of organic ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Good for cats!
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the pictures, my cat had a bad outbreak around her eyes. Extreme redness and constant scratching of the area kept it irritated. I used this product on a daily basis and after day nine the redness has decreased, the hair is growing back, and there are just a few scabs left. My cat is no longer scratching at the infected area and it is beginning to heal nicely. The product says you can apply the cream up to 2 times a day. I was only able to apply it twice for a few of the days just due to my schedule. But even with once a day application it has worked wonders.
customer_reviews.author: kel78

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat's sores worse!
customer_reviews.text: Turned my cat's sores into burns! At first my cat really hated it, but he hates when anything is put on his fur (water, cat shampoo, etc), so I thought I should keep using it for a few days thinking it might sting but ultimately heal his sores. Nope! Turned the entire area into a red, raw mess. Do not buy this product for your cat. Maybe he just had a reaction to it, but I wouldn't chance it.
customer_reviews.author: Addi H

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for us
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for our dog's hotspot. We did not get to use it for more than a couple of days. He was licking the area and then having a reaction from ingesting it. It sounded like there was something caught in his throat. He just kept coughing and hacking. I do not know how well this would have worked if we were able to keep using it. No change after two days though. The seller was awesome and easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D

customer_reviews.title: Awful, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This skin treatment only made my cat's skin ailments worse. Product is kind of sticky, cat hated having it on, skin irritation was only exacerbated by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Relieves the itchy, red skin.
customer_reviews.text: So my foster showed up with some odd skin condition and missing fur. Poor little guy had just been outside and neglected too long. So first day we put it on we noticed he wasn't licking nearly as aggressively on the spots we applied it (I would have lathered his entire body if he let me). By the next day we saw noticeable improvement. Pictures are from day one and day 3. I know being indoors and having some fancy food also helps but I attribute the fact that he wasn't licking as aggressively to this cream. I'm just happy he's got some relief.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief!
customer_reviews.text: My poor dog has been miserable, apparently with some allergy, with red bumps on her belly that started extending down her back legs and she has been licking constantly and rubbing her tummy on the ground, causing inflammation and bright red, sore tummy. I've tried many products, but no relief for her. This product is amazing and I could see immediate relief from the itching, and the redness had mostly gone by the 2nd day! I've used it 2 - 3 times a day for the past 4 days and don't see any red bumps at all, but will continue for a while just to keep it at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L

customer_reviews.title: At first I assumed it was fleas so I tried all the standard flea treatments but it got worse. I rubbed this into his hotspots 2
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I thought but truly worked miracles for my cat who was constantly itching to the point he had scabs everywhere. At first I assumed it was fleas so I tried all the standard flea treatments but it got worse. I rubbed this into his hotspots 2 times a day and a week later he was a totally different cat. He actually reaches out for the jar of lotion now as if he knew it helped him
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My dog had an allergic reaction to this product. :(
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Instant Relief
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old 20lb Chiweenie develops a skin allergy every year around this time and can’t stop scratching herself, so much that she gets bald spots above her tail;/ This morning she was scratching in bed poor thing..so I flipped her over to see if anything was visible and her whole belly was red with a rash!! I applied the ResqOrganics and when I looked at the skin an hour later the rash was completely gone<3:) I have also been giving her Benadryl 3 times a day. Cheaper than the visit to the Veterinarian last year!! I also love that it’s made with organic ingredients and made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: It's working.
customer_reviews.text: It's working slowly but I'm starting to see a big improvement in my cat's skin. My cat has a hot spot on his belly and it's been going away slowly but surely. He doesn't seem to be bothered by cream it's not stinging him like other product I tried and had to discontinue because it stung. Update: My Cats hotspot is completely gone! This cream is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: 5-star
customer_reviews.text: I have to give this product a 5-star review, because it is really effective. I found many red pimples under my puppy's legs, I didn't know what caused that and I was hesitated to take him to see the vet due to the expensive treatment fee, so I decided to try this skin treatment. After one time of use, the red color on his skin disappeared but the bumps were still there, and after two times of use, his skin returned to its normal color and texture completely. It is a miracle! I still don't know what the problem was, but it is solved right now. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Wang

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Else worked for Long
customer_reviews.text: My husbands uncle has a cat with very bad allergies. Shes a senior cat whos had a couple of litters. For unknown reasons shes had a allergy flair up. Weve tried everything. The vet gave us stuff and made suggestions. And things that worked before no longer work for her allergies. Within a day the test part we tried showed improvement. I couldn't be happier and the cat was very grateful. The second visit to see her and her progress she crawled on my chest and wouldnt leave me. This product helps a massive amount of topical issues! I would recommend this very highly!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Your dog may get worse with this product
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a bad reaction to this product. She has allergies so I thought her red rash would go away .but it made the spots on her body more irritated. I had to give her a epson salt soak and bath her in coconut shampoo and conditioner. I feel bad I even put this on her. It said it was organic, and i looked at the ingredients not sure what gave her a bad reaction to this ointment.
customer_reviews.author: cindy whitis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not sure my dog still itch and still have the red spots
customer_reviews.author: maricarmen Navas

customer_reviews.title: A Complete Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs is currently suffering from allergies/itchy skin and has a very bad hot spot on one of her front legs as a result. I am looking for any kind of relief I can find, so I tried this product. I have been using it for a few weeks now on my dog and have noticed NO improvement. Their claim that this is effective for hot spots and itchy skin is simply not true for my dog. Don't waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Rukavina

customer_reviews.title: Helping my german shepherd
customer_reviews.text: This product has seemed to cut down on the wintertime itching and biting of my 9 yr old male German shepherd.The vet calls it a "seasonal allergy" I have tried hydrocortisone sprays,changing his diet,adding supplements,strictly limited ingredients,oils,baths,doggie pharmaceuticals... This is the only natural product I have tried which has actually made a significant difference.His hair is starting to grow back in spots on his legs that he licked raw.This is week 2 of use and I just ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Might not be good for Shar Peis
customer_reviews.text: This gave my dog an allergic reaction. As you can see from the picture, it made the area above her eye swell up. My dog developed mucin (tiny bumps filled with mucus) on her head as well as some hair loss and I thought this might help her. I applied it once to her forehead and in a matter of minutes she swelled up. This product may work for other skin problems but does not seem to help mucin.
customer_reviews.author: W. Park

customer_reviews.title: This is a miracle for my pup's hot spots!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been battling scabby and inflamed hot spots for months on her belly, underarms and groin area. I have tried so many topical treatments, vitamin supplements and cytopoint injections- nothing was working. She was so uncomfortable and I couldn't figure out what to do. I tried this on a whim and it cleared every single hot spot in THREE DAYS. I am amazed and thankful!! I am going to tell my vet about this cream so she can recommend to all of her patients, because I am truly in awe of this product. Buying the human version today, as it has healed some cuts on my feet in a matter of days also!
customer_reviews.author: Hilaree Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Photos to prove it.
customer_reviews.text: Seasonal allergies were terrible this year. Already in grain free food and fish oil, he needed something else. It took some time to start working and some effort on my part. In the beginning I had to use an e-collar after application while it soaked into his skin. He wants to lick it off. As he got better I used the e-collar less and less during application. This is only a 2oz jar so used only in areas where there was hair loss. As you can see by the photos things are improving. Not a cure all but yes some improvement and relief.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for my pet.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a on going issue with hotspots and so far no treatment has helped. The ointment doesnt have a scent and I've been using this continuously on my pet and no progress. Also warning to all pet owners make sure your pet never licks the area you applied mine did and got very very sick.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Dabrowski

customer_reviews.title: Made the situation worse
customer_reviews.text: Okay. I hate to admit this, but my cat has OCD issues which could be because of her younger “sister” (our border collie). She licked open a spot on one of her "wrists." The vet said there was not medical cause, just a mental one. We hoped this would help heal the wound, but instead, it made the wound worse. Would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: senddebee

customer_reviews.title: Healed my cat's stomach!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is really fluffy and one day I noticed she had these raised sores all over her belly. I took her to the vet and he said she was just "overcleaning" herself but I didn't agree. I bought this and within 24 hours it had remarkable results! It didn't take long for it to clear right up. The redness went away. I might have used too much at first. She had a few come back so I just put this on and it cleared up. A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wilson

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This product has really been helping my dog with his itchiness from seasonal allergies which wakes him out of a deep sleep and he goes crazy trying to stop the itch by insanely chewing, it's so bad! But after smoothing this cream on his skin, he relaxes and falls back to peaceful sleep. I'm very happy I got this for him and will buy more when needed. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: B. T.

customer_reviews.title: Meh it's okay. Pricey. No Miracle Worker.
customer_reviews.text: There are SO many 5 star reviews on this product that it's kind of weird. I found this product to be very pricey and not any more effective than coconut oil. My dog was having skin issues (hair loss, hot spots, etc) and vet recommended a topical ointment. We chose this one based on the reviews. It's okay I guess. I didn't notice any vast improvement after a week and a half. Shrug.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Regrew an old man’s fur
customer_reviews.text: Our 18 year old Burmese cat had gotten a bald spot about the size of a silver dollar behind his ear. We had already taken him to the vet a few months prior for the same issue, but due to his advanced age I hate to put him through multiple vet visits for the same thing. I figured I would try this product, and I’m so glad I did. He hated having it put on at first, but now he's used to it somewhat. And the amazing thing is, he is growing back fur on the bald spot! It is almost filled in again. This is an excellent product and I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alva

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cream
customer_reviews.text: My kitty has something wrong, with completely matted fur in several places. Around her ears, in particular so I was thinking it might be mange. I have used this for a week and it instantly started working. Within three days the clumps started to fall off. This is soothing and she doesn't seem to bother me putting it on. It does stay odd looking, but then, it's a great product and when we're done it looks like the fur and skin will go back to normal after healing all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Clark Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Actually does what it claims to do!
customer_reviews.text: I have two pure white Siamese lovable little cats with skin problems. It broke my heart to see them scratching until they bled. We've used anti allergen shampoo, calming drops in the food, dietary changes, etc. This cream is working pretty well so far. At first they rebelled when we put the cream on them. The next day they jumped up in my wife's lap when she got the jar of ointment and sat down with it and put a towel across her lap like she did the day before. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Arpad Steven Schummer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I read the reviews claiming that this cream is to good to be true, but I am forever a skeptic. But my dog was miserable and I was desperate to find relief for him. Fleas were the culprit and I took care of that, but he had scratched himself raw and nothing was working. I applied the cream to the affected area as soon as I got it which was around 1pm. At 7pm I checked it. The open skin was almost healed and the rest of his belly showed no more sign of irritation! This stuff really works! If it doesn't work for you, then you really need to take the dog to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Leeyore

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! My baby girl puppy hit her head really hard on a couch a few weeks ago. Then days later, I noticed a patch of hair missing from her head in the same area she hit the couch. The hair wouldn’t grow back at all so I bought this stuff. The directions say to apply twice a day but I didn’t know how my puppy would react to it. So I only applied the cream once a day. After just a few days, her hair is growing back so nicely!! I’m sure that if I apply the cream twice a day for another week, the whole patch of hair will come back!!
customer_reviews.author: Thekuja

customer_reviews.title: Moldy layer on top of lotion
customer_reviews.text: Be careful, I order this and it had a layer of mold on top. I would avoid this product at all costs and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Grey

customer_reviews.title: Did not help for hotspots
customer_reviews.text: My dog has hot spots that he scratches all the time. Thought this product would help alleviate the itching as it advertised. Tried the product for a week and never noticed any difference in his behavior, he continued to scratch same areas that were treated with ointment.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Cranberries

customer_reviews.title: Great product, worked when others didn't!
customer_reviews.text: I never did find out what caused my poor cats hair to fall out and the rash he had, but within two days of applying your cream the hair started to come back and the rash is much better! I just wish he'd be a little more cooperative in applying it, I only could get it on him once a day. Thank you so much for your fine product! PS I had tried two other products and they didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t cheap but we believe it’s worth the money. We’ve had our cat at 4 different vets the past two years trying to solve his over-grooming problem. We changed his food, had several rounds of steroid shots, and finding the right limited ingredient food + this treatment lotion has worked wonders. He is finally starting to be less miserably itchy and his hair is starting to grow back. It doesn’t smell and if he licks it a little it won’t hurt him. We started with a small size and ended up purchasing a large one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have been using this on my dog that has allergy ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this on my dog that has allergy, yeast and fungal issues. Many of the things I have to use to keep his skin stuff under control is drying and had been looking for a cream and was lucky to have found this. It definitely helps my dog's SEVERE allergy and skin issues though I do feel I need to use it in conjunction with other products to keep ahead of the nasties.
customer_reviews.author: E LEV

customer_reviews.title: Once and Done
customer_reviews.text: Our Yorkie developed and allergy with the high humidity and rain and going in the grass. She is a rescue dog and previously probably never left the cage.We tried two other products and they just didn't seem to have any effect as the chewing and licking quickly started again. Amazingly after one application on each spot the chewing, licking and biting stopped. She hasn't even looked at those spots. I wasn't expecting this result but Lacey highly recommends it. No smell or odor that you or the dog can't stand.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bill

customer_reviews.title: I really like the product so far
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product so far. My little Mexican Hairless girl has such terrible allergies this time of year and bites her paws and underside until it bleeds. I have been applying the ResQ morning and night, after our walks- I wipe down her paws and underside w/ wipes and then apply a little bit of the ResQ to the problem areas. Her paws feel much softer already. She loves the cream and tends to lick it right off, but I think enough stays on to make a difference! :) Thanks again for your wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: WillWork4Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work very well
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the product for less than 2 weeks, so can't give a definitive review, but so far it appears to be working very well. Our cat has a patch of skin that kept becoming damaged, even though we kept him inside. We put wound dressing on & it would get a bit better, then it would be red and raw again. Since we've been using the ResQ product the skin appears to be healing. And the cat doesn't mind having it applied!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I have a 3 year old pit bull. She HAD bad hot spots on her back end. It took a while (couple days to see improvements) for this product to kick in. I've been putting this cream on her everyday for the past 2 weeks. (i should have taken before and after pictures) It cleared up her redness, bite marks and now shes not biting her back end anymore! i will be buying this a second time since i'm running out. WOULD 100% RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyDre

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by vet tech
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually used this yet- it is on standby. I bought it on the recommendation of the vet tech because my girl keeps getting skin infections in her elderly years. I don't want to put her on antibiotics all the time and this was recommended to use on any sores. She had used it on her dogs and the infection went away without medications. Antibiotic resistance is a big deal so anything that helps keep antibiotic out of the body works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: The Absoultle BEST
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazin! One of my dogs suffers bad with fleas. I do my best to make sure he never gets one on him, cause all it takes is one. He gets this crazy allergic reaction to them. I have tried tons of stuff including stuff from the vet. This cream is amazing! I have put it on him 3 times in 2 days and the rash is almost gone. Most important he likes it! He wags his tail and smiles instead of hanging his head and waiting to run away. It feels good and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK FOR ALLERGIES
customer_reviews.text: My cat has had no relief for allergies, and I bought this hoping for some good luck! Unfortunately, for my cat this did not do anything. I distracted her and waited for the lotion to soak into her skin. This is what it said to do in the directions for the best effect, but it did nothing for her. It also smells kinda weird. But every animal is different so it may work for your fur baby!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Product That Really Worked
customer_reviews.text: We have a older male cat that is allergic to flea bites. His treatment had worn off and we weren't aware so he had started biting and scratching himself in a few spots on his back. We had tried everything but it wasn't working and so we decided to give ResQ Organics Pet Skin Treatment cream a try. We are glad that we did!!! Waga Wesa ( our cat's name) hot spots improved drastically and are almost all gone. We have since also used it on our dog who had injured his nose and this cream did wonders and his nose is completely healed!!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Really works.
customer_reviews.text: Creamy thick (think Greek style yogurt), this product stayed where I put it on my cat's skin. It did turn "waxy" very quickly, providing moisture where needed. Product must have felt good because cat did not immediately try to lick the stuff off his fur and scratching abated for many hours. Very little smell to this. Added benefit: felt good on MY hands, too!
customer_reviews.author: Massact

customer_reviews.title: Mange Magic
customer_reviews.text: Corgi’s are known for their thicc buttbutts, but unfortunately after moving to a new place, I’ve noticed that he started to lick his be-hind a lot and there was suddenly a bald spot. I’ve tried different remedies, but the hair growth seems to be slow. After reading the reviews, I gave this a try and after a week of putting the cream, there was a dramatic hair growth! Now he’s a much happier doggo, and one satisfied pet parent.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Soothed our poor allergy cat
customer_reviews.text: Finally - Something to help our itchy, allergy cat! We have put this guy through some many tests and treatments, and nothing seemed to work. This has really helped sooth his skin and stop him from biting and licking himself raw. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: A.Prime.Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders!
customer_reviews.text: Though I have used 3/4 of the 2oz container in only a week or so, it works! Zuka was a rescue and was patchy everywhere and especially missing hair on her head and scabby from her mange. This stuff has cleared up her chest, back, and head and helped the hair grow back!
customer_reviews.author: Racheal Lane

customer_reviews.title: Thick, healing sore, constant licking
customer_reviews.text: My dog will not stop licking causing his paws to get sores. I like that it was thick because I knew it would stay on my dogs paw for longer and slowly absorb, but it was a little difficult to apply since it was thick. It seemed to work a bit little but the second he would lick it would just get right back to normal. So if you believe your dog will stop licking completely from this, he won’t but if you put a cone on while it heals then yes I recommend for keeping from dry. Otherwise it was just a waste of money unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: It works amazingly well.
customer_reviews.text: My little (7 lbs) Persian (don't worry, I got her used) was having a painful time. Her skin had all these small scabs from flea bites. I'd tried other topical ointment but nothing was working. Finally I lit upon ResQ and it is amazing! Within 2 days her skin was almost completely clear. She actually likes having it rubbed on her. Thank you so much for bringing my happy CC back. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Spellman

customer_reviews.title: This works!!
customer_reviews.text: This worked for my boy pretty much immediately. Not 100% positive but I think he has flea allergies. He’s affected on his back and starts losing hair. I keep flea meds on him consistently. This heals when he gets extra irritated and heals fast! I’m super impressed with this product! Update: used several times now and have had better luck using a vitamin E oil. This is overpriced for a temporary fix. :/
customer_reviews.author: Jaima

customer_reviews.title: Organic to the "ResQ"
customer_reviews.text: Using it and it seems to be working! I really do using this. It seems to be working great on an area for my little doxie that was burned as well as an area of psoriasis that I'm dealing with. I've also used for when I've gotten bitten by fire ants and it really works on stopping the sting and itch. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Henson

customer_reviews.title: Neutral review
customer_reviews.text: I just need to be neutral on this. My cat did not lick it off her tail, but I don't know that it did any good in terms of healing the problem. Perhaps I need to be using it every day even if she does not have an issue with her tail, but it's hard to put it on with other medicine that's necessary to heal lesions when she breaks the skin. I suggest trying this if you have similar problems with your cat, but just make sure your expectations are realistic because it might work but it might not.
customer_reviews.author: CMRoss

customer_reviews.title: Using for dog acne
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything for my dogs acne. Hydrolyzed protein (he’s still on that), antibiotics (they work until he’s not on anymore), topical antibiotics, chlorhexidine, benzoyl peroxide, etc etc. I still do some of this stuff but since I added this cream there is really improvement! It has been about 3 weeks. I apply it 2 to 4 times a day. I’m already on second jar. I really think it’s helping. I also like it because no odor and he doesn’t mind when I rub it all over his lips and chin.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Worked decently well
customer_reviews.text: I thought this cream worked pretty well but I got the smaller one and there wasn't too much in it. My dog had a bald spot from scratching her ear and it seems like it made it smaller. I guess her spot needed more cream. It didn't completely get rid of the problem with the one bottle. I ran out of the cream within 1-2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Unscented, dry finish, the BEST cream!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets hot spots from having dry skin in the winter months. This cream is not scented and unlike all other creams I've used, is not sticky or oily. It easily absorbs into my dog's skin, leaving a dry finish. It is very gentle and I absolutely recommend it. I also use it on her little elbows and it has softened them. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Di G.

customer_reviews.title: Natural alternative
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a military dermatitis that my 3 legged feline leukemia cat had on his chin & it cleared it up nicely plus I like the fact that its all natural & has manuka honey in it which I believe is the best ever & my hubby & I have used Manuka Honey so we know it works & I'm so glad that there is a safe & natural product that has this ingredient in it that we can use for our beloved pets.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia McCaskill

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on my German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd’s skin is very sensitive. He got an insect/spider bite that he kept gnawing at. His fur was completely gone around the area that was red and exposed. Just 4 days of applying the cream twice a day worked wonders. The itching and redness were gone.
customer_reviews.author: LylyH

customer_reviews.title: Soothing Skin Cream for my Dog
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my piebald dachshund who is allergic to grasses and loves to frolic in them but pays the price of red inflamed skin as a result. This cream has helped his skin return to a more normal appearance and he doesn't seem to mind its application nor is he as itchy. I have tried other creams in the past with less favorable results so for now this cream seems to be working very well.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: LIFESAVER! For small cuts, scrapes, bug bites & hotspots
customer_reviews.text: This is such a lifesaver!!! My dog skinned her leg- this healed it! Hotspots! Healed them. The other day my dog took a chunk of skin near his eye... i put it on ONCE and two days later it’s almost completely healed! The only thing is i can never for the life of me get my dogs to keep the cream on. They ALWAYS lick it off. I recommend putting the cream on them immediately feeding your dog or giving them a bone. Sometimes it will work if i skip some on when shes dead asleep. It’s a great product, but hard to keep out of my dogs mouth.
customer_reviews.author: margawab

customer_reviews.title: I never thought i would find anything that works...it os small n pricey...but so worth the relief!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! My poor standard Pomeranian had been suffering mange mites for a long time! I never knew he had this...n also the scabies mites...given to me n my 2 cats! What a nitemare!! I never knew the extent of pain n itching my poor animals have gone thru! This has been a godsend! Mites have been dying off...w/no returns...along w/spraying n steam washing & washing tons of laundry daily! Sofar it is working soothing all of our skins...n all of us finally getting much needed sleep we hadn't had in 4 months! I will be ordering more!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Beason

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic healing cream!
customer_reviews.text: I am fostering a dog for a rescue. She was in the shelter for over 6 months and has callouses and bald spots from laying on the hard concrete floors for so long. I have been using this cream for about 10 days now and it has made a huge difference. Her callouses have softened considerably and the hair is starting to grow back. This is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Kim L. Gwinn

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!  Relief!
customer_reviews.text: My dog says, “Thank you so much!” He was constantly licking and itching his feet and underside was so red and warm. He got this last Summer as well. Nothing has worked until this cream! And it worked pretty much immediately! Today is day 1 and not one bite or sctract h or lick since! I will update in a week or so. I decided to try it on myself as well. If it works, I will let you know. Ordering more since I ordered the smallest bottle to try it.
customer_reviews.author: southernbelle2012

customer_reviews.title: It works and saved me hundreds in vet bills
customer_reviews.text: My cat had a problem overgroomimg due to a food allergy. After changing his diet, 3 months later he was still over grooming. I was spending $160 at the vet ever month for steroid and allergy shots. I purchased this product with a surgery suit with little expectation. This is the only thing that has worked. When he gets an itchy spot, I rub it on and he stops and starts purring and giving me kisses. Thank you so much for this !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaiden

customer_reviews.title: great on dogs with skin issues - first tried it ...
customer_reviews.text: great on dogs with skin issues - first tried it on Dixie's ear and face swelling crusty stuff - it allowed it to heal. I'm using it now on a yorki with a strange neck rash - seems to also be working on that - basically it soothes the skin and the pup stops scratching the irritation. I do take each pup to the vet also. I love it. Most of my dogs (foster failures) are old and fairly delicate, so this gentle solution is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: D. Heater

customer_reviews.title: Works Well When Not Licked Off - Apply while distracted
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I actually bought body lotion for my dog, but he was suffering from the winter dryness. The jar is tiny. A little went a long way since our dog doesn't have a lot of belly hair. A person recommended applying it while he was distracted with dinner or on a walk. That worked well. He didn't think to lick it off. It suppressed the scratching and biting for several hours, which made it worth the money. The fact that it was organic made me feel better when he did elect to lick it off.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyOne

customer_reviews.title: I needed something to calm the skin and whenever possible I like natural products
customer_reviews.text: I got this for one of my senior forever foster dogs. He is quite rotund and has chafing around the armpits. I needed something to calm the skin and whenever possible I like natural products. His chubby armpits aren’t as red and inflamed and hopefully if I use this more the skin will be completely calm. I like this product and Fred(my old dog) says thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Based on a friend’s recommendation, I bought this lotion for one of my dogs who suffers from dermatitis due to seasonal allergies. The lotion itself has a thick consistency which made it easy to apply on my dog’s stomach and legs. It also practically had no scent to it which helped keep my other dog from investigating her brother’s treated areas. Unfortunately for my pup, this lotion did not heal his rash outbreak but seemed to irritate it more. We had to stop using this lotion after only a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hackley

customer_reviews.title: This cream is a life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I have a white Boxer and they are known for being prone to medical issues, including mites and other skin issues. This cream is a life saver. The scabs he had on his head almost started to heal immediately. We've been using it for two weeks now and the improvement is amazing. Also, it doesn't have any smell to it and the application isn't bothering him at all.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Thick, creamy & Smells good.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice thick cream. I’ve actually used it on a few of my own patches of dry skin. The only reason I don’t give it a 5 is that I don’t think it’s making a difference on my Chihuahuas feet. I think she has contact dermatitis from the grass. But I’m not sure. I’ve actually been using a steroid to treat it, but I use the ResQ every other day on her paws. Makes them so soft. I will definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works really really well for helping with pups itchy skin. Cleared up my dogs heat rash within a few uses. Small product but you don’t need much at a time. I used once a day and my dog felt so much better. I used about half and my neighbor had same issue so I gave the rest to her. And helped her dogs also. If I ever need more I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Charles & Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: seems to be working but really slowly
customer_reviews.text: My kitty lost the hair on either side of her nose from "contact dermatitis". I bought this cream after trying a lot of other creams, and after a month it seems to be working. At first she cleaned it off all the time, but now she seems Ok with leaving it on. We put it on her twice a day. Her hair is very slowly growing back.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio snowbird

customer_reviews.title: Seriously worth every penny!! Miracle worker!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog got an allergic reaction and picked up fleas when we visited somewhere new for a week. That combination left him with itches that he scratched raw. His hair fell out, red skin became exposed, and no amount of any shampoo helped for the long term. This cream did wonder! Within days his skin started healing and his hair started to grow back. I could tell it soothes his sores and itches as well. Bought it twice already and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: tesia yoon

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunalty has not done much to clear my cats rash" would like to return for a refund.?
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves the Taste
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't figure out how to keep my labrador retriever from licking this off, she really likes the taste. I finally got to the point where I would carefully put it on her while she was asleep but even then it was hit or miss whether she would wake up and start trying to eat it. I do think it helped her skin irritation, I just wish it didnt taste so appealing to her!
customer_reviews.author: AllieK

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had been losing hair around her mouth and nose so I bought this hoping it would help with the itching and promote hair growth. I’ve been using it for a month or so and I’m finally starting to see her hair grow back and less itching! I think it took a while to start working because she kept licking it off but now that she’s more used to it, I’m happy with the product and this will last a long time! Proof is in the pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great Organic Product
customer_reviews.text: My cat has a severe skin problem where he bites and pulls his fur out leaving clumps all over the house. ResQ Organics is the only product I have tried and it works considerably well. This cat is very skittish so I'm not able to get it behind is hind legs but I have seen quite an improvement on his back. The bald spots are growing in and he is not biting and ripping his fur out like he was. I will buy this product again. It isn't harsh and goes on like a thick paste.
customer_reviews.author: Mootsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This item works great my cat had mange on it wasn't sure if the item was working the,company reached out in an email told them wasn't working my cat was still itching they told me what to do keep applying product less than a weak it went away and hair grew back I would buy this item again the only thing I would probably advise is item is a bit small for the price but worth it because I don't even use half of the container
customer_reviews.author: Justin torres

customer_reviews.title: Doggy lotion
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this. So far it has soothed her itchy dry spots. It doesn't smell bad, and it doesnt leave a greasy residue. I will definitely be purchasing more ResQ Organics products
customer_reviews.author: April S

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product! When I put it on my dog's ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! When I put it on my dog's soft underbelly, any irritated bumps are gone within a few days, and he stops scratching himself. This is a much better treatment than food allergy testing, especially since his problem is contact dermatitis from acrylic blankets and grass, not food. (I got rid of the acrylic but can't get rid of the grass!) He loves it when I apply ResQ to one side and then the other and insists on licking my fingers after each side. It's our ritual. Thank you for such wonderful help!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for my cat. He kept rubbing his nose and I thought this would help it heal. However, I didn't see any improvement. Ot didn't make it worse or anything, it just didn't fix his skin issue.
customer_reviews.author: Suha Zein

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this product. Organic, natural ingredients are so important to me, especially when it comes to my fur babies. I’ve been using it to help my pup’s paws heal after he had been chewing due to allergies. He seems to know it’s helping him and doesn’t give me too much trouble putting it on. It absorbs very well into his skin and does not leave any sort of residue on clothing, etc in my experience. Highly recommend and will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Dogmum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: We have had to take our 1 year old cat multiple times to the vet for steroid shots due to dermatitis skin issues and its costly. After researching alternative treatments to try, we came across this product and am so happy we did. After using twice a day for almost a week now, our kitty is so much happier and healing!!
customer_reviews.author: SMorefield

customer_reviews.title: You have to buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This really works! My older cat had an allergic reaction to his food that had him itching all over. This cream both soothed his itching and pain and quickly healed his sores. He stopped scratching and chewing immediately after application, and his sores were visibly better in two days. Like most cats, he doesn't appreciate products being applied to him, but once he realized how good this made him feel, he was a willing participan. He's a happy cat again! It even helped a scratch on my own hand. As an added bonus, it smells great and made his fur even softer. Every pet parent should have this on hand. I know I will not run out before ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Paula D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had taken pictures, before and after. The results were amazing. In a matter of hours the red, raw and angry looking hot spot on my dog was already regaining a more natural skin tone! Really in just a few hours I saw results! My dog has had so many medicines used on him that must burn he is hard to hold for treatment. He was surprised it did not burn and by the second treatment he was much calmer. Now he comes to me and turns around looking back at his back, telling me it needs more cream. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: ginaprays

customer_reviews.title: I love this product for my pet's skin but I also ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my pet's skin but I also used it on my own skin, and I think this is a fantastic product. I am happy that it works so nicely to correct dryness and irritation, especially on sensitive skin. My dog has very bad dandruff and I feel like this cream helps her skin without irritating her. I can apply this cream on her skin and she does not have a negative reaction or any kind of sensitivity. I am very pleased with this product! A+
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: My car loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My car had a scale bald patch on his back.I purchased ResQ Organics and much to my cats despair I put it on the spot. That evening he let me put the cream on. From then on ,all I had to say was" Smokey, it's time for your medicine" and he would come to me to apply it! It clear up the half patch within a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona J Sutter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing!! I have been having problems with my Rotty's skin and have tried so many different products and home remedy's. After the first 2 days I saw a difference in her skin and she stopped scratching. This is my new go to product and If you are having problems with dry skin or hot spots this is definitely the product. I love the fact that it is all natural and organic. I will be telling all my friends who have fur babies about this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Souders

customer_reviews.title: Working well!!
customer_reviews.text: I was doubt before using this cream to my dog. He was suffering badly for the skin allergy all his body.. I used this cream twice a day and his skin got much better. It didn't smell strong and absorb smoothly. He is almost recovered except his eye area so I bought 2nd one. Even it worked for my cat, he got lost some fur near the eye.. may got infected from a dog... but after using this cream my cat completely recovered!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Hyunju Yi

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin irritations Happy Pouch
customer_reviews.text: After trying so many things to heal my dog of the horrible skin irritation he had, I finally found the right product. It took about a week before I saw results, but he's on his way to recovery. That horrible smell is gone. I'm going to order more real soon and plan on keeping my house well stocked with it. I'm going to use it each time he gets a bath to continue to keep his skin healthy. I had my doubts, but it really worked. Thanks so much, Nigel and I are so well pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Redmond

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I waited a couple weeks before I reviewed this product on my lab with hair loss and dry skin. I am extremely happy after two weeks of use and my big boy is growing his fur back and seems to have a little pep in his step. Just ordered another
customer_reviews.author: Mike villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Desperately bought this to try on my French Bulldog. She was diagnosed with Pemphigus but also has terrible skin allergies. I have used this whenever she has a skin flare up, feet, face, body and it has given her amazing results. Typically before even using a topical steroid I use this first and the lesion is successfully treated 98% of the time. I use it 3 times a day and only a small amount is needed. It's been a lifesaver. It is now a staple in her health routine. I wish it was just a little less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: leigh

customer_reviews.title: Works VERY well and quickly!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! One of my cats has lost hair between his shoulders, and I had been using aloe on it from a plant I have in my yard. It was soothing and may have helped a little, but this ResQ cream worked wonders. His hair immediately started growing back, and I'm glad to have it on hand now if he has another problem with hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Stowe

customer_reviews.title: Safe ingredients; easy to apply; a perfect cream for man (and ladies) or beast
customer_reviews.text: This is a very expensive cream, however, it should last a long time because you only need to touch it and it takes a while to absorb it into the skin. I don't know if it's helping my dog or even if the dog has a problem; his neck is naked. It should protect him and good to have it in case it becomes a problem. The ingredients are perfectly safe and all the good stuff that helps in healing; I even put some on my face as a makeup base instead of the poisonous things we buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline T. Moulder

customer_reviews.title: Within a week her skin was noticeably better. I applied the cream less regularly over the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed with this product. I have a Sharpei that developed patches of dry skin and hair loss on her face. The patches were itchy and cracked, sometimes oozing. I was worried about infection. In my attempt to avoid yet another visit from the vet I thought I would give this product a try. Within a week her skin was noticeably better. I applied the cream less regularly over the next 2 weeks until it was gone. I'm so thrilled to have found this product and I really relied on the reviews. Thank you to everyone who took the time to describe their pet's issues. I really appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat had a hot spot or fungal infection on his back. Diagnosis not verified by the vet but I got this stuff to see if it helps and it did. Cat's skin is healed and hair is starting to go back in the area. Save me the trip and money to go to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great for Every Family Member!
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent not only for pets but doggy parents too. I've had a few days to try it on doggy noses, paws and itch spots and bites and it works great. The cream literally melts into skin, is very soothing and quick acting. Surprisingly effective on bug bites, cuts and rashes. Will definitely purchase again. Great customer service seals the deal...
customer_reviews.author: Platinum SilverLadiBugg

customer_reviews.title: Magical potion!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING stuff!! Our golden has had a recurring yeast infection under his neck ... Way too many prescriptions, with not enough results —- ANNNND, then, this stuff came along - and, a week later — his issue is GONE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Price

customer_reviews.title: More than 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this stuff more than 5 stars I would. My dog has a skin issue and she had chewed herself raw. I tried a bunch of different stuff and finally came across ResQ Organic Pet Skin Treatment. I use calendula on myself and love it and I figured maybe it would work on my pup as well. I cut the hair around the area she was chewing and applied. The skin was almost completely cleared up in a few days - it was amazing! I would totally buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Marysadventure

customer_reviews.title: The cream seems to work pretty well. Every year my Boston Terrier suffers with ...
customer_reviews.text: The cream seems to work pretty well. Every year my Boston Terrier suffers with skin allergies, and the medications the Vets prescribe can do more harm than good. I was searching for something natural to use on my dog and came across this cream. It seems to be helping to clear up his break outs. He doesn't seem to be itching quite as much either. The only down side is that my dog keeps licking it off when applied to areas he can reach. Fortunately it's not harmful. I will definitely use again in the future if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this on my guniea pig who has mange mites. Since ive started applying it her hair has started growing back and she has stopped itching. This cream really works!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Worker
customer_reviews.text: I am always cynical when trying new products and always manage my expectations, BUT this product was AMAZING. I have two guinea pigs that have different disorders but they both involve hot spots and hair loss. One of them is particularly brutal on a leg hotspot so, I had hoped the cream would work as good and as fast as Neosporin does for humans. I put it on her wound when I got it and the wound had cleared up by the next day. It kind of blew my mind. Needless to say, it works. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Naillon

product_meta.title: ResQ Organics Pet Skin Treatment - Effective for Hot Spots, Mange, Itchy Skin, Allergies, Dry Nose, Cracked Paws, Promotes Hair Growth.
feature_bullets: FINEST NATURAL AND ORGANIC INGREDIENTS: Combines Organic Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, Coconut, Olive and Hemp Seed Oils, Shea Butter, Blue Green Algae for Minerals, with Vitamins A, B, C, E and Amino Acids. With powerful natural Antibacterial, Antiviral, Antifungal, Antimicrobial, Anti-Inflammatory ingredients. Nutrient rich with everything your pets’ skin needs to heal.
TREATS: Hot Spots, Mange, Insect Bites, Dermatitis, Abrasions, Itchy Skin, Wounds, Burns, Cuts, Dry Nose, Cracked Paws, Ringworm, Kitty Acne, Swelling, Sores. Promotes hair growth and cell regrowth.
ABSORBS QUICKLY: Non-greasy formula. Helps heal wounds from the inside out. No alcohols, mineral oils or harmful chemicals.
SAFE AND EFFECTIVE: Steroid free. Works naturally with no side effects.
MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: There is absolutely no risk to you when you order now! If you are not completely satisfied, receive full refund, no questions asked.
